title: expose weakness (does it stack?)
body: I dont know much about this mastery. Does it stack when multiple champs take it?

replies.body: The damage amp doesn't stack no.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5onbfdd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-26T05:54:31.039+0000)
>
> The damage amp doesn't stack no.

So it doesn't stack... but will it blend?

> [{quoted}](name=CitadelOfIce,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5onbfdd,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-04-26T06:13:41.324+0000)
>
> So it doesn't stack... but will it blend?

I assume you mean if both bot laners have it will they both do extra from the others and the answer to that is yes.
